ABOUT.BODY_TEXT: FlowBTC é a mais nova plataforma de negociação de bitcoins e moedas digitais no Brasil. Sua equipe conta com profissionais com mais de 15 anos de experiência em tecnologia e mercado financeiro. Nosso compromisso é com constante inovação e transparência e informação.

WHAT.BODY_TEXT: Bitcoin is a consensus network that enables a new payment system and a completely digital money. It is the first decentralized peer-to-peer payment network that is powered by its users with no central authority or middlemen. From a user perspective, Bitcoin is pretty much like cash for the Internet. Bitcoin can also be seen as the most prominent triple entry bookkeeping system in existence.

CONTACT.TEXT_COMPANY_NAME: Contamos com uma equipe altamente treinada e pronta para tirar qualquer dúvida. Por favor envie um e-mail para:

INDEX.TITLE_TEXT: Global cryptocurrency exchange networking with global cryptocurrencies.
INDEX.OTP: Activate OTP verification for your security.
INDEX.EXCHANGE1_TIT: A multi-platform exchange enables you to trade with international fiat currencies
INDEX.EXCHANGE1_TXT: Global exchange for more than 200 different fiat currencies
INDEX.EXCHANGE2_TIT: Advanced Market-making Technology by Financial Engineering
INDEX.EXCHANGE2_TXT: Enhance trading efficiency and security based on financial specialists.
INDEX.EXCHANGE3_TXT: Designed easy trading platform for cryptocurrency beginner.
INDEX.EXCHANGE4_TXT: Provides more than 20 professional trading order types: Market, Limit, Stop Limit, IOC and etc.
INDEX.INFO1_TXT: Strictly chosen cryptocurrencies will be listed without consideration of technical limit whether it is public or private blockchain.
INDEX.INFO2_TIT: Able to handle one million transaction per second
INDEX.INFO2_TXT: Based on the advanced matching order system, BitNaru can process more than a million transactions per second.
INDEX.INFO3_TXT: Provides a regular security check by independent security company to ensure your cryptocurrencies from hacking.
INDEX.INFO4_TIT: Enhanced security system through the firewall between each level of administration
INDEX.INFO4_TXT: Encrypted information such as customer information is secured by multiple stages. Between each administration stage, firewall prevents from the third-party damage.
INDEX.NAME: Name

FEEINFORMATION.FEE_CON01: -0.01% and 0.1% for Maker and Taker fees will be applied on all BitNaru users respectively.
FEEINFORMATION.FEE_CON02: Same fees will be applied for all cryptocurrencies within BitNaru exchange.
FEEINFORMATION.MAKER_CON: Maker is a user who increases the size of the order book by making non-immediate buying/selling orders. For example, when Bitcoin costs 8,000,000 KRW and a person wants to make order 10,000 KRW less than the price, this is called Making order and the person is Maker.
FEEINFORMATION.TAKER_CON: Taker is a user who decreases the size of the order book by making instant buying/selling orders. For example, when Bitcoin selling order exists at 8,000,000 KRW, a user makes instant buying order(Taking order) at that price and the user is called Taker.
FEEINFORMATION.FEE_TXT03: Withdrawal fee is applied at flat rate per transaction. There is no deposit fee.

PRIVACY.GENERAL01: LinkerKorea Co., Ltd. (hereinafter “Company”) values customers’ personal information highly and complies with laws, including the Act on Promotion of Information and Communications Network Utilization and Information Protection, and other relative laws regarding the Personal Information Protection Act, and take such action to protect customer’s personal information.
PRIVACY.GENERAL02: “Processing Personal Information” means a guideline that Company needs to comply in order to let the customers to use the services with confidence by protecting customer’s personal information, which the company highly values.
PRIVACY.GENERAL03: This processing personal information is applied to company’s website(https://www.bitnaru.com) service. Separate privacy policies may apply to services provided on other websites.
PRIVACY.GENERAL04: The company will company will notify you through the website announcement (or individual notice) when revising the personal information processing policy. Users are urged to check back frequently when visiting our site.
PRIVACY.PURPOSE: 2. Purpose of collecting and using of a personal information
PRIVACY.PURPOSE01: Company may process personal information for the following purposes. The processed personal information will not be used for any purpose other than the following purposes and will be subject to prior agreement if the purpose of use is changed
PRIVACY.PURPOSE_CON01: - Verification of a user’s identity, his/her willingness to obtain membership, his/her willingness to withdrawal membership and managing members
PRIVACY.PURPOSE_CON02: - Preventing and sanctioning acts that interfere with the smooth operation of the service including restrictions on use and illegal use of members in violation of laws and regulations and Company’s Terms of Use, preventing theft of accounts and fraudulent transactions
PRIVACY.PURPOSE_CON03: - Provide notices such as amendment of the terms of use, preserve records for dispute settlement, process complaint, protect user and service operation
PRIVACY.PURPOSE_CON05: - Providing services, providing content, and providing personalized services
PRIVACY.PURPOSE_CON06: - Establishing a service utilization environment that users can use with confidence in terms of security, privacy, and safety
PRIVACY.PURPOSE_CON07: - Data to provide personalized services such as service usage record and access frequency analysis, statistics on service utilization, customized service according to service analysis and statistics, and advertisement
PRIVACY.PURPOSE_CON08: - Inform any upcoming events, marketing, advertisement, and etc.
PRIVACY.PURPOSE_CON09: - Providing information upon a requested made by proper and legal investigation on hacking/fraud and other performance of duty by law
PRIVACY.LIST: 3. List of collecting personal information and method of collecting
PRIVACY.LIST01: The Company collects minimum personal information that customer need to use the services of the Company. Customer may refuse to consent to collection or use of personal information if one does not wish to do so. However, if you do not agree to the collection and use of essential items in the collected personal information items, there may be restrictions on the use of some functions.
PRIVACY.LIST02: The personal information that the company collects from the user is as follows.
PRIVACY.LIST02_CON01: -  Verification of a user : Name, cell phone number, date of birth, sex, domestic/foreign, telecommunication company, duplicated registration information(DI), and identification information of the same person(CI)
PRIVACY.LIST02_CON02: -  Credit check : Name, credit rating information
PRIVACY.LIST02_CON03: -  Registering bank account : account number, name of bank, name of account holder
PRIVACY.LIST02_CON04: -  Information that is automatically generated during the process of using the service or processing the business: service usage history, access logs, cookies, access IP information, payment history
PRIVACY.LIST03_CON01: -  Name, date of birth, cell phone number, address, career, copy of identification(masking unique identification information), video information
PRIVACY.LIST04_CON01: -  Copy of identification(make blank all other information except date of birth)
PRIVACY.LIST04_CON02: -  Copy of bank statement, transfer receipt
PRIVACY.LIST05_CON01:    Company will not collect sensitive personal information that may infringe human rights (such as race, ethnicity, ideology, creed, place of birth, homeland, political orientation and criminal record, health status and sex life), and Company will obtain prior consent when the Company have to collect above information.
PRIVACY.LIST05_CON02:    In any case, the company will not use the information that the customer input for any other purpose other than the purpose stated above, or leak.
PRIVACY.LIST05_CON03: The Company collects personal information through the following methods:
PRIVACY.LIST05_CON04: - The company collect personal information which the customer, themselves, input and consent when signing up and using services. (Consent of legal representative is necessary when collecting personal information of children under 14 years old)
PRIVACY.LIST05_CON05: - personal information of users can be collected through web pages, e-mail, fax, and telephone during the consultation process through the Customer Center.
PRIVACY.LIST05_CON06: - Personal information can be collected in written form at events, seminars, etc. held offline.
PRIVACY.LIST05_CON07: - Generation information such as device information can be automatically generated and collected during the process of using PC web or mobile web (access IP information, cookie, service usage log, access log)
PRIVACY.RETENTION: 4.   Retention and usage period of the collected personal information
PRIVACY.RETENTION01: If the Company collects personal information of the user, the retention period is until the cancellation (including withdrawal application, withdrawal of directorship) after sign up. Also, at the time of termination, the Company will destroy the personal information of the user and instruct the third party to destroy the personal information that are provided to the third party.
PRIVACY.RETENTION02: However, if there is a need to preserve by the laws and regulations such as commercial law, Company may retain transaction details and minimum basic information during the preservation period prescribed by laws and regulations, and notify customers regarding this period in advance, and the company may preserve the customer’s personal information if the period of retention has not elapsed or if the company receive customer’s consent individually.
PRIVACY.RETENTION03: The case when Electronic Commerce Law, Electronic Financial Transactions Act, Telecommunications Privacy Protection Act, etc. allows the company to retain the personal information. The company may retain the personal information in compliance with such laws, and never uses this information for other purposes.
PRIVACY.RETENTION_CON01: 1)  Records of consumer complaints or disputes
PRIVACY.RETENTION_CON01_01: -  Retention reason : consumer protection act in electronic commerce
PRIVACY.RETENTION_CON02: 2) Records on the collection, processing and use of credit information
PRIVACY.RETENTION_CON02_01: -  Retention reason : Act on the Use and Protection of Credit Information
PRIVACY.RETENTION_CON03: 3)  Record of payment and goods supply
PRIVACY.RETENTION_CON03_01: -  Retention reason : Consumer Protection Act in Electronic Commerce
PRIVACY.RETENTION_CON04_01: -  Retention reason : Consumer Protection Act in Electronic Commerce
PRIVACY.RETENTION_CON05_01: -  Retention reason : Protection of communications secrets Act
PRIVACY.RETENTION_CON06: 6)  Company internal policy to prevent illegal use
PRIVACY.RETENTION_CON06_01: -  Record period of illegal use : 5 years
PRIVACY.PROCEDURES: 5.   Procedures and methods of personal information destruction
PRIVACY.PROCEDURES01: In principle, the company destroys customer’s personal information without any delay when the purpose of collecting personal information if achieved. The procedure and method of destroying personal information of the company are as follows.
PRIVACY.PROCEDURES_CON01: 1)    Destruction procedure : The information entered by the user for registration is transferred to a separate DB (retained in separate cabinet in case of written form) after the purpose is achieved and is stored for a certain period of time and destroyed after the period according to internal policy and other relevant laws and regulations(refer to retention and usage period)
PRIVACY.PROCEDURES_CON02: 2)    Destruction period : In the case where the personal information of the user has elapsed, destruction should be taken place within 5 days from the end of the period of holding the personal information. If the personal information such as accomplishing the purpose of processing personal information, abolishing the service, the destruction should be taken place within 5 days from the day when it is deemed unnecessary to process the personal information
PRIVACY.PROCEDURES_CON03_01: - Personal information printed on paper shall be destroyed by being shredded through shredders or burnt
PRIVACY.PROCEDURES_CON03_02: - Personal information stored in an electronic file is deleted using a technical method that can’t play the record
PRIVACY.TRANSFER01: The company uses overseas could services to provide smooth services and enhance user convenience. In this regard, we inform you about the transfer of personal information abroad as follows.
PRIVACY.TRANSFER02: Accepting the transfer of personal information according to use of overseas server(Microsoft Azure)
PRIVACY.TRANSFER_CON01_A: A.     E-mail, password, name, cell phone number, account number, date of birth, sex, domestic/foreign, duplicated registration information(DI), and identification information of the same person(CI), access IP, cookies, service usage record, access logs, credit rating information, address, career, copy of identification (masking unique identification information), video information
PRIVACY.TRANSFER_CON02_A: A.   County : Microsoft Azure service provided area
PRIVACY.TRANSFER_CON02_B: B.   Date : Registration and revision of each customer
PRIVACY.TRANSFER_CON02_C: C.   Method : Transfer data through highly secured private network server that are in Global cloud area
PRIVACY.TRANSFER_CON03_A: A.   Name of company : Microsoft Corporation
PRIVACY.TRANSFER_CON03_B: B.   Address : 15010 NE 36th St Redmond, WA 98052
PRIVACY.TRANSFER_CON04_A: A.   Provide Global Cloud service in order to operate this Web site
PRIVACY.TRANSFER_CON05_A: A.   Until personal information is retained and purpose is fulfilled
PRIVACY.SEVEN01: The company entrusts the following personal information processing tasks for the smooth handling of personal information business, and both regulates and supervises the entrusted company to process personal information safely in accordance with the Information and Communications Network Act.
PRIVACY.SEVEN02: Customer have the right to refuse consent to the consignment (provision) of personal information. However, customer may be restricted from using the services when refused to consent.
PRIVACY.SEVEN_TABLE03: Retention and usage period of personal information
PRIVACY.SEVEN_TABLE05: Until withdrawal of membership or end of the consignment. Decided by relevant laws
PRIVACY.CUSTOMER: 8.   Customer’s rights and how to exercise the rights
PRIVACY.CUSTOMER01: 1)    The subject of the information can exercise the right of personal information protection at any time with respect to the company
PRIVACY.CUSTOMER01_02: -       Request revision when error is found
PRIVACY.CUSTOMER02: 2) The exercise of rights under 1) may be done in writing, by telephone, e-mail, or fax (FAX) to the person in charge of personal information protection and the department in charge. And the Company take action without any delay.
PRIVACY.CUSTOMER03: 3) If the subject requests correction or deletion of personal information, the company will not use or provide the personal information until the correction or deletion is completed.
PRIVACY.CUSTOMER04: 4) Users can view or modify their registered personal information at any time and may request withdrawal of consent and termination of membership.
PRIVACY.CUSTOMER05: 5) The company does not accept membership of children under the age of 14 who need the consent of legal representative.
PRIVACY.COOKIE_01: Cookie means “contact information file” and is used by the company to provide members with faster and more convenient use of the website, and to provide specialized customized services. The Company identifies your computer with regard to cookie management but does not identify you individually.
PRIVACY.COOKIE_02: Customers have the option of installing cookies. By setting options in the web browser, members can accept all cookies, check each time a cookie is saved, or refuse to save all cookies. However, if you refuse to install cookies, you will not be able to use the web conveniently, and you may have difficulty using some services that require login.
PRIVACY.MEASURE: 10. Measures to ensure the safely of personal information
PRIVACY.MEASURE01: The Company, pursuant to Article 29 of the Personal Information Protection Act, has the following technical, administrative and physical measures to ensure safety.
PRIVACY.MEASURE01_CON: The Company installs security programs to prevent leakage and damage of personal information caused by hacking and computer viruses, and the Company periodically updates and checks, installs the system in an area where the place is separated from outside and technically and physically monitors and blocks them.
PRIVACY.MEASURE02_TIT: 2)  Minimize the staff and educate them :
PRIVACY.MEASURE02_CON: The Company limits the personal information processing staff to the person in charge and implements measures to manage personal information. In addition, we constantly emphasize compliance with the company's personal information processing policy through on-the-job training to the person in charge.
PRIVACY.MEASURE03_CON: The personal information of the user is encrypted, stored and managed so that only the user can know it, and the important data is using the separate security function such as encrypting the file and transmission data or using the file lock function.
PRIVACY.MEASURE04_CON: The company takes necessary measures to control access to personal information through granting, modifying, and deleting access rights to the database system that processes personal information. We also control unauthorized access from outside by using an intrusion prevention system.
PRIVACY.MEASURE05_CON: We keep documents with personal information and auxiliary storage media in safe place with lock.
PRIVACY.MEASURE06_CON: The company has set up a separate physical storage place for storing personal information and both set up and operates access control procedures on this place
PRIVACY.PERSON: 11. Person in charge of protecting personal information
PRIVACY.PERSON01: The Company is responsible for the handling of personal information and has designated the person responsible for personal information protection as follows for the complaint handling and damage relief of information related to personal information processing.
PRIVACY.PERSON_TABLE01: Contact for protection duty of personal information
PRIVACY.PERSON_TABLE04: Responsible person of protecting personal information
PRIVACY.PERSON_TABLE08: Person in charge of protection personal information
PRIVACY.PERSON_CON01: The information subject can ask the person in charge of protecting personal information about all personal information protection complaint, complaint handling, and damage relief that occurred while using the company's service (or business). The company will answer and handle inquiries of the information subject without delay.
PRIVACY.PERSON_CON02: Customers are responsible for maintaining the security of your ID and password related to your personal information. The company does not ask the user directly about the password in any way, so please be careful not to let the password leak to the other person. The Company shall not be held any responsible for any problems caused by leakage of personal information such as ID, password or mobile phone number due to personal negligence of the user, or for the risk of Internet.
PRIVACY.PERSON_CON03: Despite the company's possible technical remedies, there is no liability for damage to information due to unforeseen accidents caused by network dangers such as hacking using advanced technologies.
PRIVACY.PERSON_CON04: If you need to report or consult about other privacy infringement, please contact the following organizations.
PRIVACY.PERSON_URL05: Cyber department of the supreme public prosecutor's’ office
PRIVACY.DUTY01: In the case of addition, deletion or modification of this Privacy Policy, we will announce amendment and contents through announcement at least 7 days prior to the enforcement date.

INFO_USE.MARKET_CON04:
Other cryptocurrencies tradable with Bitcoin(BTC)
- Trading price for cryptocurrency is determined with BTC standard and converted price for KRW is indicated for reference purposes
(i.e BTC standard price times current price of BTC/KRW)
INFO_USE.DATA_CON: Transaction amount is calculated based on transaction amount accumulated during last 24 hours at BitNaru.
INFO_USE.ORDER_TYPE01_CON:
fixed price order is used when price is valued more than whether trade is made on the trade contract. Hence when order is made after price is decided, that order is not made above the fixed buying price nor below the fixed selling price.
(Orders that are not made yet are maintained until BTC and KRW market orders are manually cancelled)
INFO_USE.ORDER_TYPE02_CON: Market price order is made at the advantaged level when quantity orders are made. It is used for fast and convenient trade.
INFO_USE.STANDARD_COIN: KRW Market (Categorized by the price of coin)
INFO_USE.LIMIT01: Daily Withdrawal Limit on Security Level
INFO_USE.USE01: ※ Daily withdrawal limit is initialized at 09:00 am KST
INFO_USE.USE02: ※ Daily withdrawal limit for cryptocurrency is applied when withdrawal amount for KRW is converted
INFO_USE.USE03: ※ Deposit/withdrawal for KRW and cryptocurrency may be limited if illegal trade or fraud is suspected

TERMS.ARTICLE1_TXT: This agreement stipulates the rights and responsibilities of the company and its customers regarding the terms and conditions of use of BitNaru and BitNaru related services (hereinafter referred to as “services”) provided by LinkerKorea Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as “company”)
TERMS.ARTICLE2_TITLE: Article 2 (Specification, Explanation and Revision of Terms)
TERMS.ARTICLE2_LIST1: 1. The terms of this Agreement shall be posted on the website for mobile app and pc provided by the company or otherwise notified to the user and shall be effective upon acceptance of these Terms by the user as a customer.
TERMS.ARTICLE2_LIST2: 2. The Company may amend these Terms and Conditions to the extent that it does not violate the relevant laws such as the “Regulation of Standardized Contract Act”. The law regarding the promotion of information and communication network usage and protection of information. If the Company amends the Terms and Conditions, it shall notify the date of application and the reason for the revision and shall be announced along with the current terms on the initial screen of the Company site, or on the popup screen or notice field from 7 days prior to the effective date to the day before the effective date.
TERMS.ARTICLE2_LIST3: 3. The company shall notify the customers of the amendment terms in accordance with the preceding paragraph and at the same time clearly notify or inform that it shall be deemed to have made an intention not to do so within seven days Nevertheless, if the customer has not expressly expressed his intention to refuse, the customer shall be deemed to have accepted the amended terms.
TERMS.ARTICLE2_LIST4: 4. If a customer expressly expresses that he or she does not agree to the application of the revised Terms, the Company shall not apply the revised Terms and Conditions, in which case the customer may terminate the User’s Agreement. If there are special circumstances that do not use original terms, the company may terminate the contract.
TERMS.ARTICLE3_TXT: The matters not specified in these Terms and the interpretation of these Terms and Conditions shall be governed by the general practice of the Act on Consumer Protection in Electronic Commerce etc, the Act on the Regulation of the Terms, the Consumer Protection Directive established by the Fair Trade Commission However, regarding the transactions made between the customers through the services provided by the Company, relevant laws such as the Law on Visit Sales, etc, the Electronic Commerce Basic Act, and the Consumer Protection Act are applied first, and the customer can assert the counterpart.
TERMS.ARTICLE4_TXT: The definitions of the terms used in these terms are as follows
TERMS.ARTICLE4_LIST1: 1. customer: A person who has approved the terms and signed a membership agreement with the company by signing up for membership.
TERMS.ARTICLE4_LIST2: 2. ID: This is a combination of letters and numbers approved by the company for customer identification and service use.
TERMS.ARTICLE4_LIST3: 3. BitNaru’s website provided by the company to enable customers to use the services of the company.
TERMS.ARTICLE4_LIST4: 4. Password: This is a combination of letters and numbers approved by the company for customer identification and protection of customer information.
TERMS.ARTICLE4_LIST5: 5. Merchant: A customer who wants to sell a cryptocurrency and has registered or applied for the cryptocurrency on the form that the company provides online.
TERMS.ARTICLE4_LIST6: 6. Buyer: A customer who wants to purchase a cryptocurrency and registers the cryptocurrency in accordance with the form offered online by the company.
TERMS.ARTICLE4_LIST7: 7. Autonomous transaction: In the process of delivering virtual money, it refers to the transactions that the seller and buyer jointly deal with without the company’s participation. But company’s participation may take place to specific cryptocurrency that the can be traded in a certain way the company set.
TERMS.CHAPTER2_TITLE: Chapter 2 Application for service use and acceptance (subscription and withdrawal)
TERMS.ARTICLE5_LIST1: 1. The User shall apply for membership by filling in the customer’s information according to the Company’s designated sign-up form and expressing his intention to agree to the Terms.
TERMS.ARTICLE5_LIST2: 2. membership is the time when the consent of the company reaches the customer.
TERMS.ARTICLE5_LIST3: 3. The contract of use is signed by the customer ID When the contract of use is established, the applicant is registered as a customer.
TERMS.ARTICLE5_LIST4: 4. A customer who is not a real name or has been misrepresented by stealing private information such as a person’s name, phone number, etc is not legally protected and all liability for civil and criminal liability shall be borne by the registered customer.
TERMS.ARTICLE5_LIST5: 5. If you are under 19 years of age or someone who is limited in capability, you are restricted from using service related to cryptocurrency trading provided by the company.
TERMS.ARTICLE5_LIST6: 6. In case of the application under Paragraph 1, the company may request the verification of the real name through the specialized agency and the verification of the individual according to the type of the user according to the relevant laws and regulations when necessary And the Company shall not be liable for the disadvantage caused by the failure to confirm the identity of the user by refusing to make such a request.
TERMS.ARTICLE6_LIST1: 1. Application for application is made online by recording the required information in the company’s prescribed application form.
TERMS.ARTICLE6_LIST2: 2. When proceeding corporation registration, you need additional documents that the company requests on top of documents required for general registration.
TERMS.ARTICLE6_LIST3: 3. All customer information on the sign-up form is considered to be actual data, and users who have not entered their real name or actual information will not be legally protected and may be restricted from using the service.
TERMS.ARTICLE6_LIST4: 4. The Company may suspend the use of the Service or terminate the Permanent Suspension and Use Agreement if the factual information or false information is entered or later revealed to be such information Any damages incurred by the Company or any third party are the sole responsibility of the customer
TERMS.ARTICLE6_LIST5: 5. The Company may provide customers with a variety of useful information about the Company's related services via e-mail, correspondence, telephone, etc.
TERMS.ARTICLE7_TITLE: Article 7 (Consent to Use of customer Information and Approval of Application for Use)
TERMS.ARTICLE7_LIST1: 1. The Company shall use the customer’s personal information for the purpose of fulfilling the contract of use and providing the service under this contract
TERMS.ARTICLE7_LIST2: 2. membership information may be provided to companies’ affiliate stored with the Company in order to make it easier for customers to use services that are affiliate stored with the Company and the Company We must notify the contents of membership information in advance and obtain the customer’s consent.
TERMS.ARTICLE7_LIST3: 3. The Company will not transmit the advertisement information of the affiliate stored service against the express wish of the customer to refuse the reception.
TERMS.ARTICLE7_LIST4: 4. customers can view and modify personal information at any time by modifying their membership information.
TERMS.ARTICLE7_LIST5: 5. customer’s registration of membership information on the application form and application for use of the company in accordance with the terms and conditions shall be deemed to be the consent of the company to collect, use and provide the customer information described in the application form in accordance with this agreement.
TERMS.ARTICLE8_LIST1: 1. The Company may accept membership registration if the customer has made an application for using the Company by filling in all the matters required by the Company’s prescribed application form However, in cases 2 and 3, the Company may suspend acceptance or refuse consent.
TERMS.ARTICLE8_LIST2: 2. The Company may reserve the acceptance of the application for use under the following subparagraphs
TERMS.ARTICLE8_LIST2_1: A) If There is no room in the facility.
TERMS.ARTICLE8_LIST2_2: B) in case of technical difficulties.
TERMS.ARTICLE8_LIST2_3: C) In case of difficulty in accepting the use of the other company for convenience.
TERMS.ARTICLE8_LIST3: 3. The Company may not accept the application for the use of each of the following subparagraphs.
TERMS.ARTICLE8_LIST3_1: A) If the name is not a real name.
TERMS.ARTICLE8_LIST3_2: B) You have applied using name of another person.
TERMS.ARTICLE8_LIST3_3: C) In case of applying for false statement of the contents of the application for use.
TERMS.ARTICLE8_LIST3_4: D) If the act of using the service that is effective in the user’s residence becomes against the law or has any possibility to be against the law according to laws being complied with countries excluding South Korea.
TERMS.ARTICLE8_LIST3_5: E) If confirmed that any under aged or user that has limited capability was registered without agreement of legal representative.
TERMS.ARTICLE8_LIST3_6: F) If found out that a user had broken law associated with South Korean government while using the service.
TERMS.ARTICLE8_LIST3_7: G) If found out that there has been money deposited or withdrawn for purpose of fraud associated with telecommunication, financial service etc.
TERMS.ARTICLE8_LIST3_8: H) If applied for purpose of threatening peace and order or harming traditional custom.
TERMS.ARTICLE8_LIST3_9: I) When there was a shortage of application requirements set by the company.
TERMS.ARTICLE8_LIST3_10: J) If in case of the company being not able to generate new account due to South Korean government’s new policy, amendment or abolishment on affiliate organization.
TERMS.ARTICLE9_TITLE: Article 9 (Termination and Cancel of Use Contract)
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST1: 1. When a customer wishes to terminate the contract, the customer himself / herself must apply for termination to the company through service menu or customer service. The company is not responsible any damage incurred during the process of user terminating his/her contract and service on the company.
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2: 2. The Company may terminate the use of the service or limit the use of the service or terminate the use contract when the customer has performed any of the following subparagraphs if there is any violation such as the following.
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_1: A) In case, you have stolen someone’s service ID and password.
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_2: B) In case of intentional interference with the operation of the Service.
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_3: C)If the customer name is not a real name.
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_4: D) In case of intentional dissemination of content that is detrimental to public order and morals.
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_5: E) When a customer plans or implements the use of the Service for the purpose of impeding national interest or social public interest.
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_6: F) In the event of impairing or disadvantageous behavior of others.
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_7: G) When transmitting large amounts of information or transmitting advertising information for the purpose of interfering with the stable operation of the service.
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_8: H) When a computer virus program that causes malfunction of information or communication facilities or destruction of information is distributed.
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_9: I) Illegal use of personal information, user ID and password of others.
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_10: J) When the information obtained from the company’s service information is copied or circulated or used commercially without prior consent of the company.
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_11: K) The same user double-registered with another ID
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_12: L) Infringes the intellectual property rights of the Company, other customers or third parties
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_13: M) When there is a request for correction by an external organization such as the Broadcasting Communication Deliberation Committee, or if it is interpreted by the Election Commission in relation to the illegal campaign.
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_14: N) In violation of Company’s terms of use including this Agreement
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_15: O) If you are notified about a long-term dormant subscriber, you have not made a statement about the use of the service within the notice period.
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_16: P) When a customer tries to sell or register a nonconforming commodity for sale or commits a commodity trading that is in violation of public order and morality.
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_17: Q) In the case of refusing to purchase a customer’s product without intending to purchase it, or when the customer has registered the goods without intention of actually selling the goods
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_18: R) When collecting, storing and disclosing personal information about users without their consent
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_19: S) Direct Derivatives Derive from Information Obtained Through Company’s Service Information
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_20: T) Inevitable in company policy to improve services of other companies- for each of the following subparagraphs
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_21: U) If the operator or administrator finds it inappropriate to use
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_22: V) An act of judging objectively that it is connected with a crime
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST2_23: W) Acts contrary to relevant laws
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST3_1: A)  If the Company wishes to restrict the use, the Company shall notify the customer or agent of the reason by specifying the reason, date and time, and writing or using the telephone or homepage message function However, if the Company recognizes that it is necessary to suspend the use of the service urgently, it may restrict the use of the service without the process of the preceding paragraph
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST3_2: B)  If a customer who has been notified of suspension of use of the service or his / her agent has objection to suspension, he / she may appeal
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST4_1: A If the same activity is repeated two or more times after the Company stops using or restricting use of the service, or if the reason is not corrected within 30 days, or if there is a violation of 1 ② (A), the Company may terminate the use contract
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST4_2: B If the company terminates the use contract, the membership registration is canceled And the Company will notify customers in this case and give them an opportunity to call before the expiration date
TERMS.ARTICLE9_LIST4_3: C Even though the user contract is canceled, the user can still apply for signing the user contract. But when it comes to re-joining the contract, there may be some limits in regard to time, discussion of terms etc.
TERMS.ARTICLE10_LIST1: 1. customers may view and modify their personal information at any time through the Personal Information Modification screen, but the name, date of birth, gender, and ID required for service providing and management may not be possible to modify.
TERMS.ARTICLE10_LIST2: 2. customers must notify the Company of any changes made to the membership at the time of the membership application by online modification or by e-mail or other means.
TERMS.ARTICLE10_LIST3: 3. The Company shall not be held responsible for any disadvantage caused by not informing the Company of the changes in Paragraph 2
TERMS.ARTICLE11_TITLE: Article 11 (customer’s Responsibility for customer ID and Password Management)
TERMS.ARTICLE11_LIST1: 1. When connected user logs into the company’s web/mobile page and application putting in information of the user’s account, password and matching log-in information that other member provides to the company, all transaction is considered as a true action done by the user
TERMS.ARTICLE11_LIST2: 2. customers are responsible for all management of the ID and password and customers are responsible for any consequences arising from the negligence, misuse, or misuse of the ID and password given to the customer.
TERMS.ARTICLE11_LIST3: 3. Clients should avoid using easy-to-copy ID or password, regularly change password for security and maintain the safety of account and its data and should restrict third party’s non-approved access to your account.
TERMS.ARTICLE11_LIST4: 4. If a customer finds out that his or her ID has been misused, he must notify the company and follow the company’s instructions.
TERMS.ARTICLE11_LIST5: 5. In the case of Paragraph 3, the Company shall not be liable for any disadvantage caused by failure of the customer to notify the Company or not to follow the Company’s guidance even if it is notified.
TERMS.ARTICLE12_TXT: The Company may provide the following service information, which is deemed necessary by the customer during the use of the service, to the customer by e-mail or letter mail If the customer does not want it, you can opt out
TERMS.ARTICLE12_LIST2: 2. Services such as events and occasions
TERMS.ARTICLE12_LIST3: 3. Services to be determined by the Company from time to time and provided to customers
TERMS.ARTICLE13_TITLE: Article 13 (Recognition of risk in crypto-currency trade)
TERMS.ARTICLE13_TXT: There is no original publishing organization or agent for inside and outside of South Korea nor 3rd party to guarantee or provide the value of crypto-currency itself. Hence the value of cryptocurrency may be hugely variable in countries including South Korea in regard to changes in countries’ policy, authentic interpretation, economic environment etc. The interpretation of law in trading cryptocurrency is different in countries hence it contains a different risk compared to fiat currency and users should be aware of it.
TERMS.ARTICLE14_LIST1: 1. The services offered by the company include cryptocurrency trading (sales related, purchasing related, transaction API providing, market information search related service) etc
TERMS.ARTICLE14_LIST2: 2. The types of services provided by the Company may be changed from time to time by the Company, and the copyright and intellectual property rights of the services provided shall belong to the Company
TERMS.ARTICLE14_LIST3: 3. The Company grants to the customers only the right to use the Account, ID, Service, etc in accordance with the Terms and Conditions set by the Company in connection with the Service, and the customer shall not be allowed to provide similar services and commercial activities utilizing such thing
TERMS.ARTICLE14_LIST4: 4. The company for a better service may display and send through email and SMS various information in regard to service, service-related notice, management message and others
TERMS.ARTICLE15_TITLE: Article 15 (Notification and change of service contents)
TERMS.ARTICLE15_LIST1: 1. The Company shall notify users of the characteristics, procedures and methods of each service through the service screen according to the type of service, and the customer must understand the service and use the service for each service notified by the company
TERMS.ARTICLE15_LIST2: 2. If the contents of the service are changed, the company must notify at least in announcement of its website 7 days before the change, and the company will not be held responsible for any damages incurred by customers not viewing the notice
TERMS.ARTICLE16_LIST1: 1. The use of the service is conducted 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, unless there is a special obstacle in the business or technology of the company, but, it is not the day or time that the company set for the need for periodic inspections
TERMS.ARTICLE16_LIST2: 2. The company can divide the service into a certain range and set the available time for each range separately, in which case the information will be announced in advance
TERMS.ARTICLE16_LIST3: 3. The Company may suspend the delivery of the Service if it falls under any of the following subparagraphs
TERMS.ARTICLE16_LIST3_01: A. Inevitable due to construction work, such as maintenance of service facilities
TERMS.ARTICLE16_LIST3_02: B. In the event that a telecommunications carrier prescribed in the Telecommunication Business Act terminates the telecommunication service
TERMS.ARTICLE16_LIST3_03: C. In the case of a service provided by a third party such as an affiliate store company, not a service provided directly by the company, when a third party such as an affiliate store company terminates the service
TERMS.ARTICLE16_LIST3_04: D. Other causes of force majeure
TERMS.ARTICLE16_LIST4: 4. The Company may limit or suspend all or part of the Services in case of interruption of normal service due to national emergency, power outage, disruption of service facilities, or excessive use of services
TERMS.ARTICLE16_LIST5: 5. The Company may discontinue the services provided in the event of a replacement for a new service or for which the Company is unable to provide the Service
TERMS.ARTICLE17_TITLE: Article 17 (Limitation on customers; Use of Payment)
TERMS.ARTICLE17_LIST1: 1. The Company may limit the customer’s use of the Payment if it falls under any of the following subparagraphs
TERMS.ARTICLE17_LIST1_01: ① If seller’s and buyer’s names happen to be identical
TERMS.ARTICLE17_LIST1_02: ② If there are any requests from supporting and publishing companies for payment service
TERMS.ARTICLE17_LIST2: 2. In the case above, the company will notify the customer through the message of the website
TERMS.ARTICLE17_LIST3: 3. In case of duplication of suspension and service restriction reason, release can be processed only when all suspension termination conditions are satisfied
TERMS.ARTICLE18_TITLE: Article 18 (Limitation on customers; Deposit and Withdrawal)
TERMS.ARTICLE18_LIST1: 1. The Company may limit or delay the use of customers; deposits and withdrawals in the following cases:
TERMS.ARTICLE18_LIST1_01: A) When the name of the customer to be deposited and the name of the depositor have been deposited differently
TERMS.ARTICLE18_LIST1_02: B) If the first withdrawal amount after membership is excessive
TERMS.ARTICLE18_LIST1_03: C) In the event that the Company is operating policy requires limiting or delaying the use of deposits and withdrawals
TERMS.ARTICLE18_LIST1_04: D) Out of the scope of the service use rights set by the company
TERMS.ARTICLE18_LIST2: 2. In the case above, the company will notify the customer through the message on the homepage
TERMS.ARTICLE18_LIST3: 3. In the case of duplication of use limitation and delay reason, it can be canceled only when the administrator or the operator has the release condition required
TERMS.ARTICLE19_TITLE: Article 19 (Reversion of Right and Use of Works)
TERMS.ARTICLE19_LIST1: 1. Bitnaru user can post photos, article, information, videos, contents (hereinafter referred to as “posts”) such as opinion or suggestion on service in a way that company permits.
TERMS.ARTICLE19_LIST2: 2. Company can delete or reject user’s posts if the company thinks the posts are against the law & the company’s policy. However, company does not have right to review all posts made by users. The user can request for reviewing posts that are found to be violating the user’s right.
TERMS.ARTICLE19_LIST3: 3. User has to pay for all legal and non-legal responsibility if the user posted contents that are against the law & the company’s policy. The user has to get permission from the owner of content in order to use another user’s content.
TERMS.ARTICLE20_LIST1: 1. customers who wish to sell or purchase cryptocurrency through the services provided by the Company must register the transaction in accordance with the registration form provided by the Company
TERMS.ARTICLE20_LIST2_1: A. customers who want to sell cryptocurrency can apply for additional services provided by the company for more effective sales when registering transactions. The specific details of the supplementary services are determined by the company
TERMS.ARTICLE20_LIST2_2: B. All services provided by BitNaru to customers in connection with the sale / purchase of cryptocurrency shall be used only for the convenience of each customer, and all similar services beyond the scope of use of the service and commercial use shall be prohibited
TERMS.ARTICLE20_LIST3_1: A. Modifications such as adding registered cryptocurrency information cannot be changed after the transaction is processed
TERMS.ARTICLE20_LIST3_2: B. In the case of cryptocurrency registration, you cannot cancel additional services you have applied, only additional ones
TERMS.ARTICLE20_LIST3_3: C. If buyer is selected, deletion is not possible
TERMS.ARTICLE20_LIST4_1: A. the interest earned by the Company in the course of using the Company Service shall be in return for the Company to provide services for the payment of the cryptocurrency, and the customer shall not be entitled to claim the return
TERMS.ARTICLE21_TITLE: Article 21 (Limitation on Use of Transaction Services)

TERMS.ARTICLE21_LIST1: 1. If the member resides in a place where the company’s service use is violated or is feared to be violated by local law, the member shall confirm that his or her service use may result in disadvantages. In particular, if the members’ use of the service violates the local law or is concerned about the member’s use of the service, the investigation of the company’s investigation is conducted immediately.
TERMS.ARTICLE21_LIST2: 2. In case a court order, request for investigation cooperation from the investigation agency, and a government agency request to freeze the member’s account and electronic wallet are requested, the company shall freeze the account and electronic wallet without the consent of the member.
TERMS.ARTICLE22_TITLE: Article 22 Notification and cancellation of transaction service usage restrictions
TERMS.ARTICLE22_LIST1: 1. In case of Article 18, the company shall notify the contents to the members by e-mail or message on the website.
TERMS.ARTICLE22_LIST2: 2. In case the company makes a request for the reason why the member was forced to reject the transaction by refusing to accept the member’s license, or in case the member has a credit agreement with the other party.
TERMS.ARTICLE22_LIST3: 3. If the reason for the stop is duplicated, it can be cancelled only if all conditions are met.
TERMS.ARTICLE23_TITLE: Article 23 Contents of service fee related to cryptocurrency transaction
TERMS.ARTICLE23_LIST1: 1. The company imposes a fee on behalf of the buyer / seller in return for providing services over the Internet The fees are stated in the company’s website usage and may change according to the company and market conditions.
TERMS.ARTICLE23_LIST2: 2. The Company may discontinue any service provided in the event of a replacement for a new service or for which no other company can provide the Service
TERMS.ARTICLE24_LIST1: 1. Points refer to cryptocurrency used in the related services designated by the company and can be refunded in cash.
TERMS.ARTICLE24_LIST2: 2. In principle, the company shall accumulate a point for the seller when the transaction of the password is terminated.
TERMS.ARTICLE24_LIST3: 3. The company can give points to members at random by event.
TERMS.ARTICLE24_LIST4: 4. Points granted pursuant to paragraph 3 may be cancelled due to company circumstances.
TERMS.ARTICLE24_LIST5: 5. The company may restrict or prohibit cash refunds for points granted under paragraph 3. You can still use it for purchase.
TERMS.ARTICLE24_LIST6: 6. In principle, points will be refunded in full upon withdrawal from membership or termination of service contract. However, if you do not have a refundable account number, the points may be deleted.
TERMS.ARTICLE24_LIST7: 7. When a member leaves the membership or cancels the service contract, the points granted under paragraph 3 shall be completely destroyed.
TERMS.ARTICLE24_LIST8: 8. The company has no financial or obligation to pay points.
TERMS.ARTICLE24_LIST9: 9. The company may restrict member’s point exchange in each of the following cases: In such a case, the company may notify the members of the reason for the restriction and proceed with the authentication / verification procedure according to the company’s internal standards.
TERMS.ARTICLE24_LIST9_1: A. If there is a request from the court or the relevant authority
TERMS.ARTICLE24_LIST9_2: B. The amount, condition or method of exchange is not usual or excessive
TERMS.ARTICLE24_LIST9_3: C. In case a member is suspected of committing a crime or hiding the revenue from a crime.
TERMS.ARTICLE24_LIST9_4: D. In case reasonable need to limit exchange to company policies is recognized.
TERMS.ARTICLE25_TITLE: Article 25 Consent to customer Information Use
TERMS.ARTICLE25_LIST1: 1. The personal information protection policy of the customer is applied to the personal information of the customer When the customer writes the customer information in the use application form, it means that you agree that the Company will collect, use and provide the customer Information described in the Application for Use pursuant to these Terms and Conditions The person in charge of managing the customer information is the operator determined by the company.
TERMS.ARTICLE25_LIST2: 2. To enable customers to use the Company and the services associated with the Company in a useful and convenient manner, the Company may use the customer’s information in accordance with the procedures set forth in this Agreement or may provide such information to the business partner with the Company However, the company will always disclose or distribute your information to third parties only if we notify the partners in advance, the purpose of the offer, the details of the membership information to be provided, etc and obtain the consent of the customer, except in the case that there is a request from the national agency liable for any violation of the provisions of the Act, such as the Basic Act on Telecommunications, if there is a criminal purpose for the crime or if there is a request from the Information Communication Ethics Committee. However, the Company shall not be liable for any violation of the provisions of the Act, such as the Basic Act on Telecommunications, if there is a request from the national agency, if there is a criminal purpose for the crime or if there is a request from the Information Communication Ethics Committee, we will always disclose or distribute your information to third parties only if we notify the partners in advance, the purpose of the offer, the details of the membership information to be provided etc and obtain the consent of the customer However, that the limitations of this Article shall not apply to the exchange of mutual information between the two Parties relating to the transaction.
TERMS.ARTICLE25_LIST3: 3. If the applicant or the customer has changed the personal information on the application form, he / she must immediately correct the relevant information through the operator or the customer information change window, but you cannot change the customer ID, name, date of birth.
TERMS.ARTICLE25_LIST4: 4. In the case of the preceding paragraph, the customer shall be liable for any damages caused by unmodified information, and the company shall have no liability for this.
TERMS.ARTICLE25_LIST5: 5. If a customer is dissatisfied with the handling of personal information of the company, he / she must submit the relevant information in writing to the company. In this case, the company must deal with the customer’s complaint according to the legitimate procedure.
TERMS.ARTICLE25_LIST6: 6. Customer’s revocation of contract is in accordance with Article 8, and in the event that the contract of use is terminated, the customer’s personal information will be retained in accordance with the relevant laws and regulations, such as the Consumer Protection Act on Electronic Commerce etc and shall be deleted thereafter.
TERMS.ARTICLE25_LIST7: 7. The personal information provided by the member shall not be provided for purposes other than the member’s consent. Except in the following cases:
TERMS.ARTICLE25_LIST7_1: A. In case personal information is provided to the payment agency for payment by cryptogram and billing fees
TERMS.ARTICLE25_LIST7_2: B. In case the data are provided to investigation institutions as legal evidence (it can be provided according to the legal procedure.)
TERMS.CHAPTER8_TITLE: Chapter 8 Compensation for damages and Disclaimers
TERMS.ARTICLE26_LIST1: 1. The company does not guarantee any specific terms or conditions not specified in this Agreement, to the extent permitted by law. In addition, the company shall not guarantee the value of any type of goods or cryptocurrency issued or not guaranteed payment by the company. In addition, the information, data, reliability and accuracy of facts posted on the service by the member shall not be guaranteed by the method prepared by the member, and the member shall be held liable for any damages incurred by the member.
TERMS.ARTICLE26_LIST2: 2. The company is not related to the company, such as the service operators or members, who are not impaired due to reasons attributable to their return or defects in the blockchain based on the code currency.
TERMS.ARTICLE26_LIST3: 3. In the event a member suffers damages due to the company’s negligence or negligence, the company shall compensate for damages in accordance with these terms and conditions. However, the company shall recover only the password currency and points that correspond to the result of the transaction error after the member removes the details of the transaction from the data. In addition, the company shall not be liable for indirect, special or punitive damages.
TERMS.ARTICLE26_LIST3_1: A. In case service use is disabled due to reasons attributable to the member
TERMS.ARTICLE26_LIST3_2: B. Loss of members due to reasons attributable to the members during the service access or utilization process
TERMS.ARTICLE26_LIST3_3: C. Losses arising from third parties illegally accessing or using the company’s servers
TERMS.ARTICLE26_LIST3_4: D. Losses arising from third parties preventing transmission to or from company servers
TERMS.ARTICLE26_LIST3_5: E. Losses arising from the transmission or dissemination of malicious programs by third parties
TERMS.ARTICLE26_LIST3_6: F. Losses arising from the use of services by third parties, such as damage caused by omission, omission or destruction of transmitted data
TERMS.ARTICLE26_LIST3_7: G. Loss due to failure of telecommunication services provided by the carrier. In particular, the company’s service provision has been disrupted due to the reasons for other force majeure, which are attributable to the business side of the business that establishes legal relationships such as a service contract with the company and the members and provides telecommunication services.
TERMS.ARTICLE26_LIST3_8: H. Damage caused by force majeure, such as display, accident, flood, fire, earthquake, etc.
TERMS.ARTICLE26_LIST3_9: I. Losses due to inevitable obstacles caused by the nature of the cryptocurrency. In particular, the issue management system itself has failed to provide services to the company due to its limitations or technical limitations.
TERMS.ARTICLE26_LIST3_10: J. Damage Losses arising from other intentional or innocent reasons of the company
TERMS.ARTICLE26_LIST4: 4. The company can conduct server inspection at any time to ensure stable service and the members can exchange password currency after the server is checked. In particular, when there is a possibility that the member may suffer damages due to a computer failure due to excessive number of orders, and an emergency inspection is made to the member through the necessary minimum scope.
TERMS.ARTICLE26_LIST5: 5. In the event the information provided to the company is not true, the company may suspend the service and cancel all or part of the damages caused by this Agreement.
TERMS.ARTICLE26_LIST6: 6. If a member asks the company for damages under this section, the company shall pay the member’s password or point in the electronic wallet, which the member may finally have, regardless of the member’s intention.
TERMS.ARTICLE26_LIST7: 7. If damages occur to the company due to the member’s illegal actions, the company may exercise its claim to the member for damages under the law. Therefore, please use the company’s services in accordance with the statutes.
TERMS.ARTICLE27_LIST1: 1. The Company shall not be liable for any of the following
TERMS.ARTICLE27_LIST1_1: A) In case of force majeure such as exhibition, affairs, natural disasters or national emergency
TERMS.ARTICLE27_LIST1_2: B) In the event of damages caused by intention or negligence of the user
TERMS.ARTICLE27_LIST1_3: C) In the case of a telecommunication service failure provided by other telecommunication carriers under the Telecommunication Business Act
TERMS.ARTICLE27_LIST2: 2. The Company shall not be liable for any disruption in the use of the Service due to the reasons for the User’s failure
TERMS.ARTICLE27_LIST3: 3. The Company is not responsible for any civil and criminal law related obligations. These obligations include any fraud activities or defamation caused by user during service usage.
TERMS.ARTICLE27_LIST4: 4. The Company shall not be liable for the contents of the materials posted or transmitted by users
TERMS.ARTICLE27_LIST5: 5. The Company shall not be liable for any defects in the delivery of cryptocurrency due to defective services of the cryptocurrency issuance management system or telecommunication service provider or due to the periodic server inspection time
TERMS.ARTICLE27_LIST6: 6. The contents of the cryptocurrency registered in BitNaru exchange is registered by each customer and the company is not responsible for the contents of registration
TERMS.ARTICLE28_TITLE: Article 28 Representative and Disclaimer of Guarantee
TERMS.ARTICLE28_LIST1: 1. The Company does not have the authority to represent customers who want to sell or buy cryptocurrency, and any act of the Company is not considered to be a seller or a substitute act of the Buyer
TERMS.ARTICLE28_LIST2: 2. The Company does not warrant the truth, authenticity or legality of a sales physician or purchasing physician in connection with the sale and purchase of customers through the services provided by the Company
TERMS.ARTICLE28_LIST3: 3. The Company shall not be liable for any warranties of merchandise or services handled by the site linked to the Company site linked to the Company and the Company shall operate independently and the Company shall not be liable for any transaction
TERMS.ARTICLE29_TITLE: Article 29 Competent Court and Governing Law
TERMS.ARTICLE29_LIST1: 1. When a dispute arises in connection with the use of the service, such as the company’s tariff system, the court that has jurisdiction over the company’s headquarters will be the court of competent jurisdiction
